name: Kongou, Heavenly General of the Souten
text:
"Yuubi of the Souten Fists" + 2 "Souten" monsters
If this card battles, your opponent cannot activate cards or effects until the end of the Damage Step. After damage calculation, if this card attacked: You can return 1 monster your opponent controls to the hand. When your opponent activates a Spell/Trap Card or effect that targets this card on the field, while you control 2 or more Fusion Monsters (Quick Effect): You can negate the activation. You can only use this effect of "Kongou, Leader of the Souten" once per turn.
